windntrees

Class CRUDController<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • windntrees.BasicController
      • windntrees.ContentController<T>
        • windntrees.CRUDController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class CRUDController<T>
extends ContentController<T>
    CRUDController implements WindnTrees server side CRUD functionality and maintains data repository interface reference for data persistence purposes.
    Author:
    shams

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class windntrees.BasicController

        env, logger, messageSource, request, session
